summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3870 for the improvement of North 49th Street and North 48th Street, each from Linden Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47296, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
